pages.text: While damaging other players with needles can be fun it does not give you any direct benefit. What if the damage you inflict would be added to your own health? $(br)By combining the Voodoo Poppet with a soul lantern, ghast tears and nether mushrooms you can make it do exactly that. $(br)The $(c)Vampiric Poppet$() is used by holding down the right mouse button.

It won't steal health if the health of the target is below a certain amount or your health is full. $(br)$(c)$(l)Important$()$(br)If the target has a $(l:poppets/voodoo_protection_poppet)Voodoo Protection Poppet$(/l) bound to them it will destroy this poppet when activated.
